full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI RNAM BZHAG SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, , SMRAS PA, DBU SEMS SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED RNAM GZHAG 'DI, ,'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA YAB SRAS KYI, ,DGONGS PA JI BZHIN LEGS PAR BKOD MOD KYI, ,NONGS PA MCHIS NA DAM PA'I SBYIN SNGAR 'CHAGS, ,TSAD LDAN LEGS BSHAD DAM PA'I KHUNGS BRAL BA'I, ,'OL TSOD DRI MAS BSLANG PA 'DI LA MED, ,DE PHYIR GZUR GNAS CHOS LA YID RTON PA'I, ,SKAL BZANG DON GNYER TSOGS KYIS MGUL RGYAN MDZOD, ,TSUL 'DI DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS, ,RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM DAG LA PHAN PHYIR BSDEBS, ,DGE BAS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA MA LUS PA,  ,KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA JO NANG PE SI'I SHOG DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE BAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BAS 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
